Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits hotels, motels and lodging establishments from selling prepaid rooms to another person in certain circumstances
Summary: Prohibits hotels, motels and lodging establishments from selling prepaid rooms to another person if the original guest fails to check in on the first day of the scheduled reservation or if the guest fails to check in within the first, second or third night for prepaid reservations of seven days or longer; provides penalties for violations.
LawCode: Add ยง210, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law in relation to prohibiting hotels, motels and lodging establishments from selling prepaid rooms to another person in certain circumstances
